Dan:

I made this tonight, following your directions to cut the rice, wine and stock in half. Also, I rinsed the rice through several changes of water.

It turned out REALLY well. The amount of wine was just right. DH and I are remarking how the rice is like mashed potatoes (which is good!). The pea and mushroom mixture is flavorful, and we added some freshly-grated Parmesan cheese to it.
